node.title: Aussie legend tops 50th Golden Guitar nominations
node.description: Big names like Troy Cassar-Daley, Amy Shark, Keith Urban and the Wolfe Brothers are up for the top gongs, with local legends also set to hit the stage.
node.content:
["Country music legend Troy Cassar-Daley has\u00a0led\u00a0the nominations for the 2022\u00a0Country Music Association of Australia (CMAA) Awards,\u00a0which marks its 50th year in January.", "Nominations\u00a0for the Golden Guitars were today announced in Tamworth Town Hall, where they were first awarded in 1973.", "The number of entries submitted were the most CMAA had recieved at 760 applications, topping last year's record figures.", "Cassar-Daley\u00a0is up for the most gongs with eight nominations.", "He's no stranger to the Golden Guitars\u00a0racking up 37 in total since 1996, and inducted into the\u00a0Australian Roll of Renown in 2017.", "His album 'The World Today' has now brought him in for awards including\u00a0Album of the Year and Male Artist of the Year.", "", "
Multi-award winning artist\u00a0Kirsty Lee Akers and her husband Jesse Anderson hosted the nominations at Tamworth's Town Hall.(Cassandra Power)
", "The Wolfe Brothers have picked up 7 nominations with their sentimental album \u2018Kids on Cassette.\u2019", "The band\u2019s fifth record has been nominated for both Album of the Year and Contemporary Country Album of the Year.", "The album\u2019s title track is in competition for Song of the Year and Video of the Year.", "\u2018Small Town Song\u2019 is up for Heritage Song of the Year, and \u2018Startin\u2019 Something\u2019 has been nominated for the Vocal Collaboration prize.", "To top off the Brothers\u2019 suite of nominations, they\u2019ve also been nominated for Group or Duo of the Year.", "The Brisbane-based singer songwriter Shane Nicholson has notched five\u00a0nominations for next year\u2019s Golden Guitars.", "His record \u2018Living in Colour\u2019 is also in the running for Album of the Year and the Alt Country Album award.", "The track \u2018And You Will Have Your Way\u2019 is up for both Song and Single of the Year, while the artist himself has been listed for best Male Artist.", "More than 30 artists are in the running for\u00a0nominations, including Amy Shark (feat. Keith Urban), Fanny Lumsden, Ian Moss and Tamworth local Ashleigh Dallas.", "Adam Harvey and Beccy Cole have been announced as January award's hosts.", "", "
The nominations were chosen from a record-breaking pool of more than 760 entries.(Cassandra Power)
", "
Tamworth 'humbled' for return of live music
", "Deputy Mayor of Tamworth Phil Betts said the awards were a significant milestone to not only country music, but the regional city.", "\u201cWe\u2019ve never been more excited to welcome our country music family back to Tamworth.", "\u201cIt will be an extremely humbling moment.\u201d", "Vice-Chair of the CMAA Natalie Waller said live music was\u00a0now a novelty for Australians coming off pandemic restrictions.\u00a0", "\u201cWe are thrilled to see live events coming back and seeing artists connect with audiences\u201d", "Separate to\u00a0the awards, the\u00a0Tamworth Country Music Festival had a hiatus last year due to COVID-19 restrictions.\u00a0", "With state border and travel opening to New South Wales, organisers have predicted an influx of hundred-of-thousands of tourists and musicians to the city in January.", "The music-tributed city has also spent the past several months spruiking itself up for visitors.", "In October, the Big Golden Guitar in Tamworth underwent its first makeover since the early 1990s.\u00a0", "Tamworth Regional Council's Coordinator of Visitor Economy Kate Baker said the 12-metre tall\u00a0icon was a vital piece of the music awards celebrations.", "\"It's really important, so many people come and have photos out the front of it, so it is important that we make it look beautiful again.\""]
